link.description: Ready to get started on your Gaia projects? The 'Templates' page presents a library of pre-designed blueprints to speed up your development journey. Consider them as your building blocks, giving you organized starting points for different use cases. Browse our library of templates and learn how fast you can have the basic framework up for your next groundbreaking solution with Gaia. These templates are designed to save you effort and time so that you can concentrate on the distinct features of your project instead of starting from the very beginning.
